statements: UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_value = '{"sound": true, "music": true}' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_name = 'Sound Settings', setting_value = '{"sound": true, "music": false}' WHERE setting_id = 2;
UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_value = '{"theme": "dark"}', setting_name = 'Theme' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_name = 'Sound' , setting_value = '{"volume": 80}' WHERE setting_id = 2;
UPDATE game_designers_settings SET design_style = 'Retro' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE player_settings SET player_level = 10, player_preferences = '{"theme": "Dark", "sound": "On"}' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_designers_settings SET design_style = 'Modern', designer_name = 'Alice' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE player_settings SET player_level = 10, player_name = 'Bob' WHERE player_id = 5;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_name = 'New Name', setting_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE player_settings SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 5;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'updated_value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE player_settings SET player_level = 10, player_name = 'NewPlayerName' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_value = 'true' WHERE setting_name = 'auto_save';
UPDATE PlayerCharacters SET character_level = 5 WHERE character_id = 101;
UPDATE GameSettings SET setting_value = 'updated value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerCharacters SET character_level = character_level + 1 WHERE character_id = 3;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_configurations SET config_value = 1, config_name = 'New Configuration', config_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE config_id = 456;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'new_value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_name = 'Potion';
